definition: to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The wiper of the potentiometer is connected directly to the spindle.
sentences.chinese: 電位計的孤刷直接與銷子連接。

sentences.english: Drill bits for dowel and bolts and cord.
sentences.chinese: 鑽頭的銷子和螺栓和脊髓。

sentences.english: The active upper proboscis was riveted with the lower proboscis .
sentences.chinese: 活動鳥上喙用銷子與下喙鉚接。

sentences.english: Check the pins and if there is any damage clean or possibly replace the terminals.
sentences.chinese: 檢查銷子，如果有任何損毀，進行清洗或者更換終端。

sentences.english: The cage is connected by a spindle to the torque spring and pointer.
sentences.chinese: 用銷子將其骨架結構與轉矩彈簧和指針連接。

sentences.english: All pins and loose details are to be attached to the fixture base and provided with a means of retention for storage.
sentences.chinese: 所有銷子和鬆散件要附在檢具底座上並提供保貯方法。

sentences.english: This wagon had slots to insert square, triangular, and round pegs .
sentences.chinese: 車上有個狹槽可以嵌入方形，三角形和圓形的銷子。

sentences.english: As the component slides along its axis the pin forces it to rotate.
sentences.chinese: 他補充，“當它滑動時銷子使得它旋轉。”

sentences.english: I quickly fashioned a ladder out of wooden dowels and nylon rope.
sentences.chinese: 我馬上用木銷子和尼龍繩做了一個梯子。
